item.title: A former American football player and an aspiring nurse among those killed
item.description: The identities of those killed in New Orleans are starting to emerge as families pay tribute.

item.title: To conserve or cull? Life in Australia's crocodile capital
item.description: The Northern Territory is home to over 100,000 saltwater crocodiles, but not everyone wants them there.

item.title: Tesla sales stall as China's BYD closes in
item.description: Tesla's ranking as the world's top electric vehicle seller is threatened after sales fell last year.

item.title: Palestinian Authority suspends Al Jazeera TV channel in West Bank
item.description: The Foreign Press Association has said the move "raises serious questions about press freedom".

item.title: Drunken officer freed suspects to celebrate New Year, Zambian police say
item.description: A manhunt is underway for the 13 suspects, who were allegedly released by an intoxicated police officer.
